doc:
Geoffrey Perkins https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geoffrey_Perkins 0 Geoffrey Howard Perkins (22 February 1953 – 29 August 2008) was a British comedy producer, writer and performer. Best known as the BBC head of comedy (1995–2001), he produced the first two radio series of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy and is one of the people credited with creating the bizarre panel game Mornington Crescent for I'm Sorry I Haven't a Clue. In December 2008 he posthumously received an Outstanding Contribution to Comedy Award. Geoffrey_Howard_Perkins ( 22_February_1953 – 29_August_2008 ) was a_British_comedy_producer_,_writer_and_performer . Best known as the_BBC_head of comedy_(_1995 – 2001_) , he produced the_first_two_radio_series of The_Hitchhiker 's_Guide to the_Galaxy and is one of the_people credited with creating the_bizarre_panel_game_Mornington_Crescent for I 'm Sorry I Have n't a_Clue . In December_2008 he posthumously received an_Outstanding_Contribution to Comedy_Award .
